Name: File System - Regular Expression Find and Replace (Updated)
Description: Find and replace text matching a regular expression in one or more files. Now with working $ replacement.
Author: phillip-haydon

Parameters.Name: RFRCandidatePathGlobs
Parameters.Label: Files
Parameters.HelpText: The files to search. Wildcards `*` and `**` are supported. Paths must be fully-qualified, e.g. `C:\MyApp\**\*.xml`. Separate multiple paths with `;` semicolons.

Parameters.Name: RFRFindRegex
Parameters.Label: Pattern
Parameters.HelpText: The regular expression to find in the target files.

Parameters.Name: RFRSubstitution
Parameters.Label: Substitution
Parameters.HelpText: The text to insert in place of each occurrence of _Pattern_. Regular expression [substitutions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ewy2t5e0.aspx) are supported, so any literal `$` in the substitution pattern must be escaped by doubling (`$$`).

Parameters.Name: RFROptions
Parameters.Label: Options
Parameters.HelpText: A space-separated list of options from the [RegexOptions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.text.regularexpressions.regexoptions.aspx) enumeration.
